bs-bookshelf-extension-description: Enables BlueSpice to manage and export hierarchical collections of articles.
bs-bookshelf-tag-bookshelf-desc: Inserts a chapter navigation of a book in a book page. Through this tag the mentioned articles are included in the book. Numbering is automatically adapted to the table of content.
bs-bookshelf-tag-bookmeta-desc: Tag for saving various meta data on book articles. These are included in the book. The attributes of this tag have to correlate with the meta data of the book article.
bs-bookshelf-tag-booklist-desc: Generates lists of articles from the namespace "book" and can be filtered. The indication of the filter ist mandatory.
bs-bookshelf-tagerror-no-attribute-given: No attribute provided! Use src to configure the table of contents.
bs-bookshelf-tagerror-article-title-not-: The provided source article ("$1") does not exist.
bs-bookshelf-tagerror-article-content-no: The provided source article ("$1") contains invalid data.
bs-bookshelf-pref-SupressBookNS: Supress namespace prefix of book articles in output
bs-bookshelf-pref-TitleDisplayText: Use display title from book source on article
bs-bookshelf-pref-PrependPageTOCNumbers: Prepend article table of contents and headlines with book numberation
bs-bookshelf-add-to-book-added: The page has been added to book '$1'.
bs-bookshelf-add-to-book-mod-bstag: The "bookshelf" tag of the page has been changed. The page will be reloaded.
apihelp-bs-bookshelf-store-description: Lists all books. Allows sorting, filtering and pagination. Implements ExtJS Store parameters.
apihelp-bs-bookshelf-store-param-tempBoo: List of books on the clients local store that should be included in the store response
apihelp-bs-bookshelf-bookstore-descripti: Lists all chapters for a given book. Allows sorting, filtering and pagination. Implements ExtJS Store parameters.
apihelp-bs-bookshelf-bookstore-param-nod: Speficies a node for which a subchapter list should be provided.
apihelp-bs-bookshelf-bookstore-param-boo: Specifies the book for which a chapter list should be provided.
apihelp-bs-bookshelf-bookstore-summary: Lists all chapters for a given book. Allows sorting, filtering and pagination. Implements ExtJS Store parameters.
apihelp-bs-bookshelf-store-summary: Lists all books. Allows sorting, filtering and pagination. Implements ExtJS Store parameters.
bs-bookshelf-pref-titledisplaytext-help: Shows the title from the book navigation as page title instead of the page name.
bs-bookshelf-error-type-title-mismatch: Title provided does not match the given book type
bs-bookshelf-pref-chapterpagerbeforecont: Show book chapter pager before content
Add a chapter pager at the top of the page.
bs-bookshelf-pref-chapterpagerafterconte: Show book chapter pager after content
Add a chapter pager at the bottom of the page.
bs-bookshelf-pref-supressbookns-help: The namespace of page names is hidden in the PDF output.
